lead_paragraph: LONDON--Phyllis, beloved wife of Ira, loving mother of Roberta Silverstein, Elyssa London and Suzanne Corbin. Proud and devoted grandmother of her eight grandchildren. Died peacefully on January 29, 2016. 1/3
